ActorForm.Title: Hide Name Overrides
ActorForm.TokenDispositionHint: The current disposition of this token. Configured in the token settings on this actor.
ActorForm.DefaultBehaviourHint: The current default for this disposition type. Configured in the module settings.
ActorForm.HiddenEnabledHint: Enable hiding of this actor's name in Combat Tracker and Chat Messages (overrides default)
ActorForm.ReplacementHint: The name to use instead of the Actor's name
ActorSheetButton: Configure name hiding for this actor
Settings.HideHostileH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to HOSTILE
Settings.HideNeutralH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to NEUTRAL
Settings.HideFriendlyH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to FRIENDLY
Settings.HideSecretH: Hide Names of Actors with Token Disposition set to SECRET
Settings.HidePartsH: Hides all parts of the name in chat card text e.g. Ancient Green Dragon will replace all instances and combinations of Ancient, Green, and Dragon
Settings.HostileReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Hostile Actor names
Settings.NeutralReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Neutral Actor names
Settings.FriendlyReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Friendly Actor names
Settings.SecretReplacementH: The default name to use when replacing Secret Actor names
Settings.TokenNameHiddenSuffixH: The string that gets appended to the token name of hidden tokens in the GM's view
